sourcesContent:
<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link to="/">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/AgregarProspecto">Agregar prospecto</router-link> |   
    <router-link :to="{ name: 'ProspectosEspecificos', params: { id: getLastSegment() } }">Prospectos Específicos</router-link>

  </nav>
  <router-view/>

</template>
<script>
export default {
  methods: {
    getLastSegment() {
      const url = window.location.pathname;
      const segments = url.split('/'); // Divide la URL en partes usando '/'
      return segments[segments.length - 1]; // Devuelve el último segmento de la URL
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style>
 .disabled-link {
    pointer-events: none; /* Deshabilita los eventos de clic */

  }
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #495168;
}

nav {
  padding: 30px;
  background-color: #06203a;
}

nav a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: white;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
